sentences.sentence: Women sometimes damage their skin by going overboard with abrasive cleansers.

sentences.sentence: In the late Middle Ages, it was customary to scrape away the surface of the parchment with an abrasive, which completely wiped out any writing that was there.
sentences.translation: 在中世纪后期，人们习惯用磨料刮去羊皮纸的表面，把纸上的所有文字都擦得干干净净。

sentences.sentence: His abrasive manner has won him an unenviable notoriety.
